description:
A set of monster ingredients essential for cooking. 

Beast Flesh x 30
Chitinous Shell x 30
Clear Gelatin x 30
Globby Fat x 30
Hearty Powder x 30

*These items can also be obtained in-game.
*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page.
*If maximum capacity is exceeded, the excess is discarded.
name: Trails of Cold Steel IV: Monster Ingredients Set 2
